title: CAR MODEL detail page Â» Predecessor
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see the predecessor of a CAR MODEL (if existent)\
So I can find out more about the family tree
description:
* The CAR MODEL detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected PREDECESSOR.
* The PREDECESSOR is presented with its name and primary information.
* The PREDECESSOR contains a link to its detail page.
* The PREDECESSOR has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no PREDECESSOR connected to the CAR MODEL then the section is not displayed at all.
